_addLiquidity(StrategyOpUsdc,uint256).notice: ActionType: ADD_LIQUIDITY Add liquidity to mesh pool: [op, usdc] -> mesh lpToken

_removeLiquidity(StrategyOpUsdc,uint256).notice: ActionType: REMOVE_LIQUIDITY Remove liquidity from mesh pool: mesh lpToken -> [op, usdc]

_swapOpToUsdc(StrategyOpUsdc,uint256,uin.notice: ActionType: SWAP_TOKEN_TO_ASSET Swap on UniswapV3 op -> usdc

_swapUsdPlusToUsdc(StrategyOpUsdc,uint25.notice: ActionType: SWAP_USDPLUS_TO_ASSET Swap on exchange usdPlus -> usdc

_swapUsdcToOp(StrategyOpUsdc,uint256,uin.notice: ActionType: SWAP_ASSET_TO_TOKEN Swap on UniswapV3 usdc -> op

_swapUsdcToUsdPlus(StrategyOpUsdc,uint25.notice: ActionType: SWAP_ASSET_TO_USDPLUS Swap on exchange usdc -> usdPlus
